    • getLogin

      public String getLogin()
      Retrieve the client's login.
      Returns:
      The client's login.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If no login is assigned to this client.

    • setTokenId

      public void setTokenId​(int tokenID)
      Set the client's token ID. Used for private communication.
      Parameters:
      tokenID - The token ID to set.

    • getTokenId

      public int getTokenId()
      Retrieve the client's token ID. Used for private communication.
      Returns:
      The client's token ID.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If no token ID is assigned to this client.

    • isPrivateAuthenticated

      private boolean isPrivateAuthenticated()
      Determines if this client is authenticated as a private client. In other words if this client is part of the private clients list, so we know his login and his ID.
      Returns:
      True if this client is authenticated.
